message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $170. I believe it will be highly valuable for you.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. Is that something you'd be willing to accept?
Thanks for your offer, Bob. I appreciate your interest.  While I understand your perspective, the product's value is considerably higher. Would you be willing to meet me halfway at $130?
I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I was thinking more along the lines of $110. Is that something you'd be willing to accept?
